Reviews.Title: Great LG Phone
Reviews.Author: MStyle
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone after another seller cancelled my previous order for another phone. It came much faster than I expected and the phone itself worked right out of the box.One thing to be aware of though: All of the menus (including the start up screen) are made for AT&T.; But seeing that they are my carrier, this is not a problem for me. However other people using T-Mobile may not be able to use these features (ex. AT&T; music, MobiTV, AT&T; Mall).This is a great phone and I would highly recommend buying it. I have had it for almost a week now and have had no problems with it. It's design is also stunning and puts many touch screen phones of today to shame.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: angelkitty
Reviews.Content: it arrived in the allotted time and works great just wish the keyboard was a bit bigger due to my large fingers not that friendly for texting other than that works great and a even bargain for the price thank you for reading this

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT phone!!!! i had this exact phone but lost it so i tried a couple others but DID NOT like them. I HAD to get this phone because it is amazing!! I LOVE the speaker phone, it is nice and loud with the speaker in the front!!!!! It also has a flash for the camera which is something that i use A LOT!!!! it also has a lot of memory for notes which i also really like!!! 5 STARS for this phone!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice simple phone, but battery did not work!
Reviews.Author: Rey
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone because of its size, price and 3G support; unfortunately the battery was dead and just would last for a few minutes after being fully charged. I did buy an OEM LG battery and my problem was solved.

Reviews.Title: LG Shine CU720
Reviews.Author: Dunn Diva
Reviews.Content: I should have taken into consideration other comments previously given.  I am annoyed at having to charge the phone daily.  I don't think the talk time is hour(S), maybe an hour.  To many dropped calls if you hold the back of the phone.  i am having to use as a speaker phone, waiting on earpiece to arrive to see how that will help.  Very disappointed.As far as the seller, phone was in terrific condition, delivery was a promised.

Reviews.Title: Decent for a first phone
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: I got this when it first came out as my first cell phone. For what I needed (texting and the occasional call) It was pretty decent. The only major thing I didn't like was the battery life. I had to charge it every single night, and could only talk on the phone for about an hour a day (total) or else it would die. Occasionally, it would lag and freeze for about 2 minutes, but catch up with me and do whatever I had attempted to do when it had frozen. The amount of texts it could hold was disappointing, and for someone who is always texting, it got a bit frustrating (that is why I gave it 3 instead of 4 stars). But over all, its a decent and pretty strong phone.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't even work
Reviews.Author: Anon
Reviews.Content: I have never written a review for anything I have bought on amazon until now. The phone came one day earlier than expected but it doesn't work. It won't turn on and I have had it charged for 24 hrs. If you take the battery out and plug it in it flashes the AT&T; screen every 5 seconds. Other than that it doesn't work period. Im waiting to return it and see if they fix this "problem" I will update with another review when I get the OTHER phone.
